name: Kasper Gunlab
description:
Kasper Gunlab is an experimental sandbox game. 

Q - Open chest

R - Reload

E - Swap or pick up guns on ground

Feel free to report any bugs, HTML5 problems, or feedback in general for the game. 

Known Issues (and stuff I'm too lazy to fix right now):

- Z-index of bullets, guns, etc. (Issues involving y-sorting)

- Audio lag and disruption on HTML5.

To be added in the future:

- Better chests and art and stuff.

- Hand held weapons.

- Maybe an actual map with cool stuff (Maybe).

- Exports to Mac and Linux (After I test to make sure they work).
